title: Player Requests Username Change
description: A player wants to change their in-game username.

tasks.description: Identify the player's account and check their eligibility for a username change.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the player has one free username change available.

tasks.description: Check if the desired new username is available and does not violate the naming policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the new username is available and appropriate.

tasks.description: Update the player's username in the account system.
